definition[0]: a place where large amounts of stone or sand are dug out of the ground
definition[1]: the person or animal that you are hunting or chasing
example[1]: Briefly, the hunter and his quarry glared at each other.
definition[2]: to dig stone or sand from a quarry
example[2]: The rock here is quarried for building stones.
example[3]: Chalk is quarried from the surrounding area.
definition[3]: a place where large amounts of stone, sand etc are dug out of the ground
